original_text: Listen carefully to what I am telling you, Job. Stop and think about the wonderful things that God does. Listen carefully to what I am telling you, Job.
korean_text: 욥이여 이것을 듣고 가만히 서서 하나님의 오묘한 일을 깨달으라

sentences.original_text: Listen carefully to what I am telling you, Job.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너 욥에게 말하는 것을 주의 깊게 들어라.

sentences.original_text: Stop and think about the wonderful things
sentences.korean_translation: 멈추고 놀라운 일들에 대해 생각해 보아라.

sentences.original_text: Listen carefully to what I am telling you, Job.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너 욥에게 말하는 것을 주의 깊게 들어라.
